xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: dba:job-stop
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: function dba:job-stop ( $ids as xs:string* ) as element(rest:response) { let $params := try { $ids ! job:remove(.), map { 'info': util:info($ids, 'job', 'removed') } } catch * { map { 'error': $err:description } } return web:redirect($dba:CAT, $params) }
